name: dog
description: A friendly dog with a wagging tail
deathMessages: gives one last friendly wag of its tail and closes its eyes
lets out a sorrowful howl and collapses

name: cat
description: A sleepy cat with soft fur
deathMessages: lets out a final sad meow, and dies
hisses one last time before going limp
purrs softly as it closes its eyes forever

name: goblin
description: A small, green-skinned creature with a wicked grin. It looks ready to attack anyone who comes near.
attackTexts: stabs at $TARGET$ with a rusty dagger
deathMessages: screams in agony and falls to the ground, twitching
clutches its wounds and curses you before dying
gurgles on its own blood and collapses in a heap

name: wolf
description: A large gray wolf with gleaming yellow eyes and sharp teeth. It watches you warily.
deathMessages: snarls defiantly one last time before collapsing
whines pitifully and falls to the ground with glazed eyes
howls mournfully as its strength fades away

name: Marcus the Merchant
description: A friendly merchant selling basic goods.

name: Gareth the Trainer
description: A grizzled veteran warrior with scars crisscrossing his arms. He studies newcomers with a critical eye.
attackTexts: Gareth demonstrates a painful strike on you!
deathMessages: Gareth falls, muttering about his old war wounds...

name: Goldwin the Banker
description: A stern-faced man in a crisp suit, his fingers stained with ink from ledger work. He peers at you over wire-rimmed spectacles.
attackTexts: Goldwin whacks you with a heavy ledger!
